channel.title: Services on Graphitedge
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Graphitedge

item.title: Responsive Development
item.description: “And if that sounds not like your ballpark then Helen is able to take your site mockups and using various techniques in CSS and HTML (with or without frameworks) to create and deploy a responsive website for you.”

item.title: Site Security
item.description: “With Security being the topic of the moment, have Helen take a look at the security of your site via a Security Site Checkup. Helen can then advise you on how to keep your website and clients safe.”

item.title: Web Mastery
item.description: The Site Maintainer YOU need. Since website downtime can be a costly thing for your business, Helen is able guide you through being a novice to web master in how to keep your site up and running.

item.title: Wordpress Consultation
item.description: As Matt Mullenweg has stated that he is looking to have 50% of all website run by WordPress, the need for guidance to have an effective site using Wordpress is ever increasing. Helen provides this guidance and builds sites according to an agreed scope.
